T02D2009:218b-3: de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa /
T02D2009:218b-4: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2009:218b-5: h'um chos dbyings ma bcos mkhyen pa'i thugs //
T02D2009:218b-6: 'jam dpal rgyu yi byang sems sku //
T02D2009:218b-7: autpala ral gri rab bsnams shing //
T02D2009:218b-8: zur phu nga lnga ldan gur gum mdog / zla gdan la bzhugs ye shes kyi //
T02D2009:218b-9: sku mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2009:218b-11: sangs rgyas sras bcas 'dren pa yi //
T02D2009:218b-12: 'jam dbyangs thugs khros h'um nag po //
T02D2009:218b-13: dngos grub khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2009:218b-14: rdo rje khros pas srid gsum sbyor //
T02D2009:218b-15: spro zhing bsdus pas ma he'i zhal //
T02D2009:219a-1: bzhi phyag / bcu drug zhabs can dpa' bo che //
T02D2009:219a-2: mig sman bdar 'dra'i sku mchog ni //
T02D2009:219a-4: gnag dang dmar dang ser zhal dbus //
T02D2009:219a-5: dkar dang dud mdog gnag zhal g-yon //
T02D2009:219a-6: sngo dang dmar dang ser zhal g-yas //
T02D2009:219a-7: zhal dgus srid gsum gsol ba po //
T02D2009:219a-8: gri gug rtse gcig gtun shing dang //
T02D2009:219a-9: chu gri rdo rje dgra sta mdung //
T02D2009:219a-10: mda' dang lcags kyu dbyug to dang //
T02D2009:219a-11: kha tv'am 'khor lo rdo rje dang //
T02D2009:219a-12: thod pa ral gri da ma ru //
T02D2009:219a-13: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2009:219a-14: thod pa mgo bo phub dang rkang //
T02D2009:219a-15: zhags pa gzhu dang rgyu ma dang //
T02D2009:219a-16: dril bu lag pa dur ras dang //
T02D2009:219a-17: gsal shing phub dang me thab dang //
T02D2009:219a-18: ro snod sdigs mdzub ba dan dang //
T02D2009:219a-19: rlung ras phyag g-yon bsnams pa'o //
T02D2009:219a-20: gnyis ni glang chen ko rlon gon //
T02D2009:219a-21: mi dang ma he glang dang ni //
T02D2009:219a-22: bong bu rnga mo khyi dang lug / ce sbyang g-yas kyis zhabs brgyad gnon //
T02D2009:219a-23: bya rgod 'ug pa bya rog dang //
T02D2009:219a-24: seng ge khra dang go bo dang //
T02D2009:219a-25: sngags can bzhad bya brgyad po la //
T02D2009:219a-27: mnyam nyid mi g-yo dur khrod rje //
T02D2009:219a-28: ltung ba'i lha gnyis sdig pa'i sku //
T02D2009:219a-29: sdigs mdzub drag pos gdul dka' 'dul //
T02D2009:219a-30: go bzlog mnan nas rab tu gsol //
T02D2009:219a-31: ling+ga langs shing rtog pa spangs //
T02D2009:219a-32: dpa' bo gnas na gnyis med rol //
T02D2009:219a-33: lha min kun sogs dbang pos btud //
T02D2009:219a-34: mun sel thugs kyi mngon gyur pa //
T02D2009:219a-35: rnam rtog gshin rje 'dra ba rnams //
T02D2009:219a-36: nyid rol pa yi rnam rtog gis ;
T02D2009:219a-37: / gar mkhan ral gri 'bar ba yis //
T02D2009:219a-39: 'jam dbyangs ye shes snying rje khro //
T02D2009:219a-40: ae ma srid gsum gdug pa sel //
T02D2009:219a-41: bu la ma byams gshe ba ltar //
T02D2009:219a-42: bcos ma'i khro byang khyod phyag 'tshal //
